thread.title: Afghan actress urges Afghan women to keep working
thread.title_full: Afghan actress urges Afghan women to keep working

title: Afghan actress urges Afghan women to keep working
text: > Entertainment Afghan actress urges Afghan women to keep working In this Wednesday, Oct. 1, 2015 photo, Afghan actress Marina Gulbahari, left, and South Korean actor Song Kang-ho pose during the opening ceremony of the Busan International Film Festival at Busan Cinema Center in Busan, South Korea. When Gulbahari walked the red carpet on the first night of Asiaâ€™s largest film festival, she showed the world more than the colorful traditional Afghan dress she was wearing. She showed the world the face of women in Afghanistan. (AP Photo/Ahn Young-joon)
